text: Hong Kong national under-20 football team is a national association football youth team of Hong Kong and is controlled by the Hong Kong Football Association. ==AFC U-20 Championship== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !width=80 | Year !width=100 | Result !width=20 |Pld !width=20 |W !width=20 |D !width=20 |L !width=20 |GF !width=20 |GA |- | 1959 || Group stage ||4||1||0||3||4||15 |- | 1960 || colspan=7 rowspan=2|Did Not Enter |- | 1961 |- | 1962 || Group stage ||4||2||0||2||7||8 |-style="background:#c96;" | 1963 || Third place ||6||4||1||1||17||6 |- | 1964 || colspan=7 rowspan=1|Did Not Enter |-bgcolor=beige | 1965 || Fourth place ||6||3||0||3||8||10 |- | 1966 || Group stage ||4||1||1||2||8||14 |- | 1967 || Group stage ||3||0||0||3||5||12 |- | 1968 || Group stage ||3||0||2||1||3||6 |- | 1969 || Group stage ||3||1||0||2||6||11 |- | 1970 || Quarterfinals ||4||3||1||0||9||2 |- | 1971 || Group stage ||3||0||0||3||1||6 |- | 1972 || Group stage ||4||1||1||2||15||7 |- | 1973 || Group stage ||2||1||0||1||2||4 |- | 1974 || Quarterfinals ||4||0||3||1||3||6 |- | 1975 || Quarterfinals ||5||2||0||3||5||6 |- | 1976 || Group stage ||3||1||0||2||2||11 |- | 1977 || Group stage ||2||0||0||2||1||8 |- | 1978 ||colspan=7 rowspan=22|Did Not Qualify |- | 1980 |- | 1982 |- | 1985 |- | 1986 |- | 1988 |- | 1990 |- | 1992 |- | 1994 |- | 1996 |- | 1998 |- | 2000 |- | 2002 |- | 2004 |- | 2006 |- | 2008 |- | 2010 |- | 2012 |- | 2014 |- | 2016 |- | 2018 |- | 2020 |- |Total || || 60 || 20 || 9 || 31 || 96 || 132 |} ==Current squad== The following 30 players were called up for the training camp held in Jockey Club HKFA Football Training Centre from 1 to 20 June 2020. * Head coach: Thorlakur Arnason, Cheung Kin Fung |----- !
